name: Jungle Match Puzzle
description:
Join the animal friends in the jungle. And have a fun with dual missions and challenging stages!

[Feature]
- Tons of stages
- Various dual missions
- Most powerful support items
- Sneak peek feature supported
- Auto-play mode supported
- Arcade mode: challenge for the highest score
- Versus mode(1 on 1 multiplayer): compete with payers all around the world
- Leaderboard, Achievement & friend invitation supported
- 16 languages supported
- Tablet device supported
